general_advisory: As per the forecast received from IMD, dry weather may prevail over the district of Khordha. Farmers are advised to irrigate their fields as there is a mildly dry condition. Various crop-specific advisory information is provided in the advisory section.

advisory: To manage stem borer in paddy at an early stage, use Trichogrammajaponicum card weekly for 6 times.
Apply various chemical pesticides for stem borer control.
To manage stem rot, drench soil with Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole.
To manage Aphid and Painted Bug, spray Neem Based Pesticide or various chemical sprays.
To manage powdery mildew, spray Sulphur or various fungicides.
To manage powdery mildew, spray Sulphur or various fungicides.
To manage Early Blight disease, spray Mancozeb or Carbendazim.
To manage Diamond Back Moth and Head Borer, collect caterpillars and eggs, spray Neem based pesticide or various chemical sprays.
To control Aphid, spray neem oil formulation.
To manage Epilachna Beetle, shake plants, destroy insects, spray neem-based pesticide or various insecticides.
To control thrips, spray Fenpyroximate or Abamactin.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernation in colder temperatures.
